snippet: Eight American golfers who had automatically qualified for the tournament were named Sunday, and the team captain, Davis Love III, will get four more picks.
abstract: Tiger Woods and Phil Mickelson are two of eight American golfers chosen for the Ryder Cup tournament.
lead_paragraph: Eight American golfers who had automatically qualified for the tournament were named Sunday, and the team captain, Davis Love III, will get four more picks.

headline.seo: Phil Mickelson and Tiger Woods Among Ryder Cup Qualifiers for U.S.
headline.main: Mickelson and Woods Make Top Eight for Ryder Cup Team
headline.print_headline: Mickelson and Woods Make Top Eight for Ryder Cup Team
